# Strategy: Anansi Portfolio | 2024-09-06
Source: https://app.composer.trade/symphony/ezYi3YkFHppDpwec211L/details

**Complexity**: High (9/10)
**Category**: Tactical

## Trading Universe
This strategy can trade 59 assets:

• **Stocks**: SPY, VIXY, SPLV, BTAL, QQQ, IOO, XLP, VTV, VOX, XLF, FNGA, TMF, SLV, IAU, USO, KRE, SCHE, AIA, EQWL, RSPT, TQQQ, IYW, AGG, SH, TBT, SOXX, FNGS, COST, MO, LLY, NVO, PGR, AJG, PSQ, BND, QID, TLT, QLD, SQQQ, TECL, SOXL, SPXL, KMLM, TMV, BIL, XLK, SMH, HYD, SVXY, VTI, XLU, SPHB, EEM, RINF, IEI, IWM, EDC, EDZ, IGIB

## Strategy Settings
• **Rebalancing**: Daily
• **Initial Capital**: USD 100,000
• **Trading Fees**: 0.10% per trade

## Investment Logic

```
• Equal Weight Allocation:
  ◦ Anansi Portfolio | 2024-09-06:
    ▪ Equal Weight Allocation:
      - If :
        - If SPY's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) is greater than 80.0:
          - Scale-In - 60d + 10d:
            - Equal Weight Allocation:
              - If :
                - If VIXY's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is greater than 40.0:
                  - VIX Blend | 75/25:
                    - Weighted allocation (total: 100.0%)
                      - Buy VIXY (75% of portfolio)
                      - Smooth Safety:
                        - Equal Weight Allocation:
                          - Buy SPLV (100% of portfolio)
                          - Buy BTAL (100% of portfolio)
                - Else branch:
                  - Equal Weight Allocation:
                    - If :
                      - If SPY's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) is greater than 82.5:
                        - VIX Blend | 75/25:
                          - Weighted allocation (total: 100.0%)
                            - Buy VIXY (75% of portfolio)
                            - Smooth Safety:
                              - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                - Buy SPLV (100% of portfolio)
                                - Buy BTAL (100% of portfolio)
                      - Else branch:
                        - VIX Blend | 50/50:
                          - Equal Weight Allocation:
                            - Buy VIXY (100% of portfolio)
                            - Smooth Safety:
                              - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                - Buy SPLV (100% of portfolio)
                                - Buy BTAL (100% of portfolio)
        - Else branch:
          - Equal Weight Allocation:
            - If :
              - If QQQ's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) is greater than 79.0:
                - Scale-In - 60d:

                    - If :
                      - If VIXY's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is greater than 40.0:

                            - Smooth Safety:
                              - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                - Buy SPLV (100% of portfolio)

                            - Buy VIXY (100% of portfolio)
                            - Smooth Safety:
                              - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                - Buy SPLV (100% of portfolio)
                                - Buy BTAL (100% of portfolio)
              - Else branch:
                - Equal Weight Allocation:
                  - If :
                    - If IOO's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is greater than 79.0:
                      - Step Up:
                        - Equal Weight Allocation:
                          - If :
                            - If IOO's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) is greater than 80.0:
                              - VIX Blend | 50/50:
                                - Equal Weight Allocation:

                                                            - If :

                                                                                                                - Buy FNGA (30% of portfolio)
```
